projects.title: Nexus AI — Academic Publishing Platform
projects.description: An AI-powered platform to streamline academic research from literature reviews to citation formatting and journal suggestions.

details.long_description: Led the product vision and UX strategy for Nexus AI, a platform that simplifies academic publishing for students by integrating AI-powered tools for literature reviews, citation formatting, and plagiarism checks. Conducted user research and stakeholder interviews to define roadmap priorities and KPIs. Facilitated agile delivery with cross-functional teams using JIRA, and designed intuitive user flows and interfaces. Developed a go-to-market plan tailored to the $112B AI-education space, projecting 30–50% improvements in research efficiency and publication success.
details.challenges: Integrated diverse AI models (summarization, citation, plagiarism detection) while maintaining a seamless user experience. Addressed data privacy concerns due to the sensitive nature of academic content. Overcame low user adoption in early prototypes through iterative onboarding design and feedback loops with target students.
details.learnings: Sharpened AI prompt engineering skills, especially in summarization and citation generation. Gained hands-on experience leading agile teams, coordinating across design, engineering, and research stakeholders. Learned how to validate product-market fit through rapid prototyping, student testing, and academic advisor interviews.

projects.title: UniCircle — Student Social Network
projects.description: A campus-based social platform for student connections, personalized event discovery, and interest-based reconnections.

details.long_description: Conceptualized a student-exclusive networking platform addressing social connectivity challenges identified through analysis of 25+ stakeholder interviews. Synthesized qualitative research revealing key pain points: 40% of students struggled with initial connections. Created detailed PRD with interactive wireframes, connection strength metrics, and conversation starters aligned with stakeholder requirements. Formulated phased roadmap with defined resource requirements and success metrics for platform launch.
details.challenges: Detail challenges faced (e.g., defining MVP features, ensuring user privacy, balancing features with development time).
details.learnings: Detail key learnings (e.g., conducting effective user interviews, translating user needs into product requirements, roadmap prioritization).
